reviews.review_msg: Jacqueline was great! Very nice and approachable. Going to her office hours was invaluable as her feedback brought my writing up from a low B to a solid A. Not a lot of work either! Material is quite dry though.

Shes a great prof, she really wants you to do well. Assignments and readings are not bad, you just need to take her advice and use it. I ended with a B+, learned a lot, class was little long, but other than that I enjoyed her class.
